snippet: A look at the Yankees’ postseason chances using a calculation that includes a team’s current win rate, the strength of their remaining schedule and their home-field advantage.
abstract: Keeping Score column examines New York Yankees postseason chances using calculation that includes team's current win rate, strength of their remaining schedule and their home-field advantage; shows 16.6 percent probability of Yankees clinching the wildcard and 0.1 percent overall chance of them winning the American League East.
lead_paragraph: A look at the Yankees’ postseason chances using a calculation that includes a team’s current win rate, the strength of their remaining schedule and their home-field advantage.

headline.main: Putting a Number on the Yanks’ Playoff Chances
headline.print_headline: Putting a Number on the Yanks’ Playoff Chances
